articles.description: Wild Rift is also missing some champions. At the time of writing, the game has 50 playable characters, which is roughly a third of the roster available on Mac and PC. But I don't mind the smaller selection.
articles.content: The original League of Legends demands a mouse and keyboard. In Wild Rift, though, everything is handled by touchscreen controls. (For now, there’s no option to play with a wireless controller.) Move… [+13564 chars]
